languages.text: "Сын губернатора сознался в том, что именно его ошибка привела к нарушению логистики. При помощи неизвестного доброжелателя он обвинил вас, чтобы скрыть это".

traits.locale_text: "Сын губернатора сознался в том, что именно его ошибка привела к нарушению логистики. При помощи неизвестного доброжелателя он обвинил вас, чтобы скрыть это".

languages.text: "The governor's son has admitted that it was his mistake that led to the logistics disruption. With the help of an unidentified associate, he accused the Werserians to cover up his mistake."
languages.original_text: "Сын губернатора сознался в том, что именно его ошибка привела к нарушению логистики. При помощи неизвестного доброжелателя он обвинил вас, чтобы скрыть это".

traits.locale_text: "The governor's son has admitted that it was his mistake that led to the disruption of logistics. With the help of an unknown well-wisher, he had done this to cover up his mistake."
"The governor's son has admitted that it was his mistake that led to the disruption of logistics. With the help of an unknown well-wisher, he had done this to cover up his mistake."
"The governor's son has admitted that it was his mistake that led to the disruption of logistics. With the help of an unidentified associate, he did this to cover up his mistake."
"The governor's son has admitted that it was his mistake that led to the disruption of logistics. With the help of an unidentified associate, he did this to cover up his mistake."
"The governor's son has admitted that it was his mistake that led to the logistics disruption. With the help of an unidentified associate, he accused the Werserians to cover up his mistake."
"The governor's son has admitted that it was his mistake that led to the logistics disruption. With the help of an unidentified associate, he accused the Werserians to cover up his mistake."

languages.text: 「総督の息子が、物流の混乱を引き起こす計算ミスをしたと認めた。身元の知れぬ共犯者の手を借りて、このミスを隠ぺいするために、ウェルザリアンを告発したというわけだ」
languages.original_text: "The governor's son has admitted that it was his mistake that led to the logistics disruption. With the help of an unidentified associate, he accused the Werserians to cover up his mistake."

traits.locale_text: 「総督の息子が、物流の混乱を引き起こす計算ミスをしたと認めた。身元の知れぬ共犯者の手を借りて、このミスを隠ぺいするために、ウェルザリアンを告発したというわけだ」

languages.text: “总督的儿子已经承认，物流之所以中断，都是因为他犯下的错误。他为了掩盖自己的失误，在某位身份不明的同伙的协助之下，诬陷了韦尔森家族。”
languages.original_text: "The governor's son has admitted that it was his mistake that led to the logistics disruption. With the help of an unidentified associate, he accused the Werserians to cover up his mistake."

traits.locale_text: “总督的儿子已经承认，物流之所以中断，都是因为他犯下的错误。他为了掩盖自己的失误，在某位身份不明的同伙的协助之下，诬陷了你们。”

languages.text: « Le fils du gouverneur a avoué être à l'origine de l'erreur qui a provoqué le chaos dans la logistique. Quelqu'un l'a aidé à couvrir sa bévue en faisant accuser les Werserian à sa place. »
languages.original_text: "The governor's son has admitted that it was his mistake that led to the logistics disruption. With the help of an unidentified associate, he accused the Werserians to cover up his mistake."

traits.locale_text: « Le fils du gouverneur a avoué être à l'origine de l'erreur qui a provoqué le chaos dans la logistique. Quelqu'un l'a aidé à couvrir sa bévue, et c'est pour ça que nous en sommes là aujourd'hui. »

languages.text: «El hijo del gobernador ha admitido que fue su propio descuido el que llevó a la interrupción logística. Con ayuda de un socio no identificado, culpó a los Werserian para cubrir su error».
languages.original_text: "The governor's son has admitted that it was his mistake that led to the logistics disruption. With the help of an unidentified associate, he accused the Werserians to cover up his mistake."

traits.locale_text: «El hijo del gobernador ha admitido que fue su propio descuido el que llevó a la interrupción logística. Lo hizo para encubrir su error con ayuda de un socio no identificado».

languages.text: "Der Sohn des Gouverneurs hat zugegeben, dass die logistischen Probleme durch einen Fehler seinerseits entstanden sind. Er hat den Fehler mit Hilfe eines unbekannten Helfers vertuscht, indem er die Werserians beschuldigt hat."
languages.original_text: "The governor's son has admitted that it was his mistake that led to the logistics disruption. With the help of an unidentified associate, he accused the Werserians to cover up his mistake."

traits.locale_text: "Der Sohn des Gouverneurs hat zugegeben, dass die logistischen Probleme durch einen Fehler seinerseits entstanden sind. Er hat den Fehler mit Hilfe eines unbekannten Helfers vertuscht."

languages.text: "Valinin oğlu, lojistik sorunlara sebep olan hatayı kendinin yaptığını itiraf etti. Kimliği belirsiz bir yardakçının yardımıyla hatasını örtbas etmek için Werserian tarafını suçlamış."
languages.original_text: "The governor's son has admitted that it was his mistake that led to the logistics disruption. With the help of an unidentified associate, he accused the Werserians to cover up his mistake."

traits.locale_text: "Valinin oğlu, lojistik sorunlara sebep olan hatayı kendinin yaptığını itiraf etti. Kimliği belirsiz bir yardakçının yardımıyla hatasını örtbas etmek için Werserian tarafını suçlamış."
